points.title: Dashboard Development
points.description: Collaborated with a cross-functional team to build a full-featured dashboard for managing hiring, scheduling, and contracts, streamlining the delivery of lifeguard services in Canada.

points.title: Staffing, Contracts & Payroll
points.description: Developed modules for staff onboarding, digital contract management, and shift scheduling, along with regions, and integrated financial features to track work hours.

points.title: Modern Tech Stack
points.description: Built using React, TypeScript, Vite, Ant Design, and SASS, with Axios for secure, real-time communication with backend services.

points.title: Testing & DevOps
points.description: Employed Vitest for unit testing and used Docker for containerized development and deployment workflows.

points.title: Documentation
points.description: Maintained comprehensive and clear documentation to support ongoing development.

points.title: Platform Development
points.description: Led the development of a Pool Administrator Dashboard, crafting a responsive and intuitive interface using React, Ant Design, and Bootstrap, ensuring a seamless user experience for administrators and customers.

points.title: Real-Time Monitoring
points.description: Integrated IoT capabilities into the dashboard for real-time pool monitoring, enabling dynamic data visualization and timely updates.

points.title: API Integration
points.description: Efficiently integrated RESTful APIs to synchronize real-time data, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information on pool conditions.

points.title: Collaboration
points.description: Worked closely with cross-functional teams using GitLab, contributing to project management and feature development from conception to deployment.

points.title: Responsive Design
points.description: Leveraged Bootstrap to implement a responsive design, significantly enhancing user experience and accelerating development timelines.

images.title: Visual Presence Tracking in Pool Zones

points.title: Frontend Development
points.description: Led the creation of a sophisticated CRM dashboard tailored for customer and order management in the pool services sector, ensuring a fast, responsive, and user-friendly interface using React.

points.title: State Management
points.description: Integrated Redux, redux-persist, and React Query to streamline data handling, ensure persistence, and keep the application state consistently synchronized with backend data.

points.title: Custom Components
points.description: Built a suite of reusable UI components—including a two-level depth custom tab system—to enhance navigation, consistency, and maintainability across the CRM interface.

points.title: Maintainable Codebase
points.description: Ensured consistency and maintainability of the codebase by implementing modularized SASS, facilitating easier updates and scalability.

points.title: User Feedback & Testing
points.description: Actively participated in user testing sessions, gathering feedback to refine the user interface and enhance data accuracy, contributing to a more robust and user-friendly product.

points.title: Frontend Development
points.description: Designed and developed a dynamic website from scratch for showcasing women's dresses, utilizing React, Redux, and redux-persist to create a responsive and interactive user interface.

points.title: Backend Development
points.description: Developed robust backend functionality using PHP and MySQL with phpMyAdmin, including API development and data storage.

points.title: UI/UX Design
points.description: Crafted the user interface and experience using Figma, ensuring a cohesive and user-friendly design.

points.title: Advanced Features
points.description: Implemented advanced functionality, including sorting dresses by popularity and showing related items to enhance user experience and engagement.

points.title: Styling & Design
points.description: Employed Bootstrap and SASS to ensure a visually appealing and maintainable design, aligning with modern web aesthetics and usability standards.

points.title: Admin Dashboard
points.description: Built a separate admin dashboard for efficient content management, enabling streamlined control over product listings and site functionality.

points.title: Dashboard Development
points.description: Developed a sophisticated cryptocurrency financial dashboard, featuring a unique referral-based registration system to enhance user engagement and tracking.

points.title: UI/UX Design
points.description: Created an intuitive and responsive user interface using React, integrating financial tools seamlessly to provide a comprehensive and user-friendly experience.

points.title: State Management
points.description: Utilized Redux and redux-persist for efficient data handling and persistence, improving application speed and reliability.

points.title: Responsive Design
points.description: Implemented Bootstrap to design a visually compelling and user-friendly interface, facilitating rapid development and deployment.
